alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued April 28 at 5:10AM EDT until April 29 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 7 to 9 feet expected in the surf zone. * WHERE...In Maryland, coastal Worcester County. In Virginia, Accomack and Northampton Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour.
